Title: Mile 22
Writer: Graham Roland (story by), Lea Carpenter (story by), Lea Carpenter (screenplay by)
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Lauren Cohan, Iko Uwais, John Malkovich
Plot: A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.
Production: Huayi Brothers, The Hideaway Entertainment, Closest to the Hole
